Label_Texts.specific_change_dropdown_label: Select your specific area of change

Participating_Organisation: Early closure or withdrawal of research sites
PICs - Addition of Participant Identification Centres undertaking the same activities as existing PICs
PICs - Early closure or withdrawal of Participant Identification Centres
Addition of sites undertaking the same activities as existing sites
Addition of new participating organisation type
Change to activities undertaken by an existing participating organisation type
Project_Design: Other significant change to project design
Change to background information that affects scientific value of the project
Change to the endpoint or the main objective
Change to the inclusion or exclusion criteria: non-significant
Additional or new control group (placebo) or arm to the project
Other non-significant change to the project design
Change to the participant sample size: non-significant change
Change to the participant sample size: significant
Change to the use of human biological samples in the project: non-significant (for example, change to the logistical, transporting or storing arrangements)
Data collection, transfer or processing of identifiable participant information - Changes in arrangements or organisations involved (other than the addition of new participating organisations)
Samples - addition of the storage or use of human tissue samples under the relevant legislation on Human Tissue for the first time
Samples - significant changes (e.g. to the arrangements for removal, storage or use of samples under the relevant legislation on Human Tissue)
Project_Documents: Change to case report forms (CRFs) or other documents used by the research team for recording research data
Other non-significant change to project documents
Post trial information for participants (which does not contradict the protocol)
Change to protocol: non-significant not affecting safety or the scientific value of the project
Insurance renewal - no change to the level or breadth of cover
GDPR wording - Unaccepted alternative wording used
Other significant change to study documents (e.g. information sheets, consent forms, questionnaires, letters) - Please specify in the free text below
Protocol - Significant changes (e.g. affecting safety or the scientific value of the trial)

Addition_Of_Sites_Option.specific_change_dropdown: Addition of sites undertaking the same activities as existing sites

Early_Closure_Withdrawal_Of_Sites_Option.specific_change_dropdown: Early closure or withdrawal of research sites

Addition_Of_Participant_Identification_C.specific_change_dropdown: PICs - Addition of Participant Identification Centres undertaking the same activities as existing PICs

Early_Closure_Of_Participant_Identificat.specific_change_dropdown: PICs - Early closure or withdrawal of Participant Identification Centres

CRF_Other_Study_Data_Records.specific_change_dropdown: CRF/other study data records - Changes in the documentation used by the research team for recording study data

GDPR_Wording.specific_change_dropdown: GDPR wording - Accepted wording used verbatim

Other_Minor_Change_To_Study_Documents.specific_change_dropdown: Other minor change to study documents (e.g. information sheets, consent forms, questionnaires, letters) that will have additional resource implications for participating organisations

Post_Trial_Information_For_Participants.specific_change_dropdown: Post trial information for participants (which does not contradict the protocol)

Protocol_Non_Substantial_Changes.specific_change_dropdown: Protocol - Non-substantial changes (e.g. not affecting safety or the scientific value of the trial)

Translations_Addition_Of_Translated_Vers.specific_change_dropdown: Translations - Addition of translated versions of participant-facing documentation

Other_Minor_Change_To_Participant_Proced.specific_change_dropdown: Other minor change to participant procedures
